DOCNAME: BATINOVIC AND POINT-TRADE, D.O.O. v. CROATIA
TEXT: The first applicant , Mr PERSON , is a NORP national who was born in DATE and lives in GPE . The second applicant , ORG , d.o.o . , is a limited liability company with its seat in PERSON . The applicants were represented before the ORG by Palić and ORG , GPE . ORG ( “ the Government ” ) were represented by their Agent , PERSON .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .
The applicants were shareholders of ORG , which is a joint stock company with its seat in GPE ( “ the GPE ” ) . The ORG was entirely owned by private individuals and companies .

On DATE ORG ( Savjet Hrvatske Narodne Banke , “ the ORG ” ) adopted a decision to appoint a temporary manager for ORG . According to LAW , from DATE of the service of such decision , all powers of the management board , the supervisory board and the ORG assembly were transferred to the temporary manager . Subsequently , on DATE the ORG prolonged the appointed temporary manager ’s mandate for DATE .

Meanwhile , on the basis of an expert opinion indicating the ORG ’s financial losses , on DATE the ORG proposed to the Government to commence the process of sanation and restructuring of the ORG in line with the domestic legislation .

According to the above proposal , on DATE the Government adopted ORG ( “ the LAW ) . From that date , all shares of the shareholders were withdrawn and annulled . Following the process of sanation , the ORG was to issue new shares , all to the name of ORG for Securing Deposits and ORG ( PERSON agencija za osiguranja štednih uloga i sanaciju banaka ) .

In DATE the applicants filed separate petitions for review of constitutionality and legality ( prijedlog za ocjenu ustavnosti i zakonitosti ) of the Decision . They complained that the Decision violated their property rights as shareholders of the ORG . They also claimed that the ORG had been in good standing and that the ORG had therefore been arbitrary and , in any event , unnecessary .
On DATE ORG ( Ustavni sud PERSON ) discontinued the proceedings because the law on which the ORG was based had meanwhile been abrogated .
The Law on ORG and Restructuring of Banks ( Zakon o sanaciji i restrukturiranju banaka , ORG no . CARDINAL of DATE , “ the LAW ” ) , insofar as relevant , read as follows :

“ The procedure of sanation and restructuring shall take place when a bank shows potential losses ... of PERCENT of the amount of its share capital , if the ORG deems such procedure feasible and economically justifiable .
The decision on sanation and restructuring of a bank shall be given by ORG on the basis of a proposal by the ORG . ”
The LAW was abrogated on DATE ( Zakon o prestanku važenja zakona o sanaciji i restrukturiranju banaka , ORG no . CARDINAL of DATE ) .
ORG ( ORG o sanaciji i restrukturiranju GPE PERSON d.d . , GPE , ORG nos . CARDINAL of DATE and CARDINAL of CARDINAL DATE ; “ the Decision ” ) , insofar as relevant , reads as follows :
“ It is established that on DATE the ORG has
( a ) risky placements and potential obligations in the amount of CARDINAL kunas , including potential losses of CARDINAL kunas :
( b ) doubtful and disputed claims ... in the amount of CARDINAL kunas ;
( c ) business losses incurred in DATE and DATE and DATE in the amount of CARDINAL kunas .

On DATE of the publication of this Decision all existing shares of the ORG shall be withdrawn and annulled . The ORG shall issue new shares in the amount of MONEY kunas , which shall be entirely owned by the ORG . ”
The LAW of GPE ( ORG , ORG no . CARDINAL of CARDINAL DATE ) provides as follows :
“ The right of ownership is guaranteed .
CARDINAL . Property may be restricted or taken in accordance with the law and in the interest of GPE subject to payment of compensation equal to its market value .

CARDINAL . The exercise ... of property rights may , on an exceptional basis , be restricted by law for the protection of the interests and security of GPE , nature , the environment or public health .
ORG :
- shall decide on the conformity of statutes with the LAW ;
- shall decide on the conformity of subordinate legislation with the LAW and statutes ;

- may decide on the constitutionality of statutes or subordinate legislation which are no longer in force , provided that from the moment of their abrogation until the submission of an application or a petition to institute the proceedings not DATE has passed . ”
LAW on LAW ( Ustavni zakon o PERSON , ORG no . CARDINAL of CARDINAL DATE ; “ the LAW ” ) , insofar as relevant , provides as follows :
“ Every individual or legal person has the right to request the institution of proceedings to review the constitutionality of statutes or subordinate legislation ....
“ The Constitutional Court shall commence proceedings within DATE after the petition has been lodged . ”
The relevant part of section CARDINAL ( CARDINAL ) of LAW ( Zakon o sudovima , ORG nos . CARDINAL/CARDINAL , PERSON , CARDINAL and CARDINAL ) as in force at the material time reads as follows :

Commercial courts ... adjudicate disputes concerning establishment , functioning and dissolution of commercial companies as well as disputes concerning dispositions with membership and membership rights in such companies ... ”
In its judgment Pž-CARDINAL/CARDINAL - CARDINAL of DATE ORG ( ORG trgovački ORG ) adopted a judgment , which insofar relevant reads as follows :

“ It is declared that PERSON ... is a shareholder of ORG . GPE and holder of rights in respect of CARDINAL shares of nominal value of CARDINAL HRK each ... , and therefore entitled to both the property rights deriving from these shares and all the rights acquired through the investment of capital in GPE banka d.d . from its foundation until DATE ... ”
